scripts.start-dev: cross-env HTTPS=true HOST=0.0.0.0 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-scripts start
scripts.start-university: cross-env HTTPS=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=8080 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-scripts start
scripts.start-secure: cross-env HTTPS=true HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=8443 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-scripts start
scripts.start-windows: set HTTPS=true&& set HOST=0.0.0.0&& set GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false&& react-scripts start
